header.title: ABOUT ME
header.subtitle: Here you will find more information about me, what I do, and my current skills mostly in terms of programming and technology

about.title: Get to Know me
about.info1: I'm a web developer focused on solving problems and creating websites and web applications that lead to the success of your brand. Check out some of my work in the Projects section.
about.info2: As a developer, I'm always focused on improving my skills, optimizing my code, and learning new technologies. I enjoy being in constant professional evolution, participating in challenging projects that drive my growth and being part of teams with effective and collaborative communication.
